Pre-Game Insights: Bahrain will have an upper hand coming into this tie, thanks to their better head-to-head record against Malaysia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Malaysia have not managed to defeat Bahrain since 1978
Bahrain are ranked 86th while Malaysia stand at the 130th position in the latest FIFA rankings
Others: Abdullah Al-Hashash (Bahrain) is a lethal striker and a proven goal-scorer at club level.
Junior Eldstal (Malaysia) will aim to continue his momentum in the Bahrain game as well.
